description: Even numbers such that some permutation of digits is an odd number.
comments: a(n) = A179083(n) for n <= 30. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 28 2010Even numbers with at least one odd digit. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 01 2013
prog: (PARI) is(n)=n%2==0 && vecsum(Set(digits(n)%2)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 23 2015
author: R. Muller
